description: Fuji is a Greenling character in Garden Story. They are an apple who works as an architect in Spring Hamlet.
Rana is a Frog character in Garden Story. They moved from Lilyputt to Spring Hamlet, and is usually found in The Bend. They have a cheerful disposition, often joking or teasing to lighten the mood.
Coqui is a Frog character in Garden Story. They reside in Summer Bar, and are usually found in Summer's End.
